#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	long long int t,n,q,x,y,p,flag;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&q);
		long long int arr[n],b[n];
		for(long long int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y);
			arr[i]=x;
			b[i]=y;
			
		}
		while(q--)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&p);
			flag=0;
			for(long long int i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				if(p>=arr[i] && p<=b[i])
				{
					flag=1;
					break;
				}
			}
			if(flag==1)
			cout<<"NO\n";
			else
			cout<<"YES\n";
			
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
